title: Anton Shipilov
text:
Anton Vladimirovich Shipilov (; born 7 March 1973 in <a href="Voronezh">Voronezh</a>) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player.
Shipilov played football for his hometown side <a href="FC%20Fakel%20Voronezh">FC Fakel Voronezh</a> until he suffered a career-ending injury in 1997.
